name: NonDocumentTypeChildNode.previousElementSibling
description: The NonDocumentTypeChildNode.previousElementSibling read-only property returns the Element immediately prior to the specified one in its parent's children list, or null if the specified element is the first one in the list.

refs.name: DOM
refs.description: The definition of 'NonDocumentTypeChildNode.previousElementSibling' in the 'DOM' specification.

refs.description: The definition of 'ElementTraversal.previousElementSibling' in the 'Element Traversal Specification' specification.
